duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct balance sheet analysis, modeling, and reporting using ALM software
Manage enterprise data retrieval, storage, automation, testing, reporting, and documentation across ALM, Budgeting, and Profitability tools
Assist with quantitative development of behavioral models related to deposits and loans
Develop and automate near-term and longer-term cash flow models
Analyze large amounts of data to build predictive models optimizing loan, deposit, and investment portfolios
Automate loading of daily, weekly, and monthly data streams into separate tools, ensuring validation and controls
Manage functional design and development of reporting platforms, responsible for data sourcing and mapping
Develop and implement custom solutions to enhance data analysis and reporting across Finance organization
Model liquidity and interest-rate risk, and manage FTP modeling and reporting
Collaborate and meet with stakeholders to incorporate business line assumptions into forecasting

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field
